result.execSummary:
The defendant Richard L. Amundson was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Richard L. Amundson is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Richard L. Amundson was found guilty of Disorderly Conduct. This is not a criminal offense and results only in a money penalty for this offense.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Fine of $200 plus costs = $456.50 to be paid within 30 days or civil judgment and referral to State Debt Collections.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Richard L. Amundson

records.addlTxt:
9:40 AM Defendant Richard L. Amundson in court.  Attorney Michael Gerald Perry . in court for Richard L. Amundson.  Prosecuting attorney Kathryn E Heineck in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
Atty Perry is heard
ADA is heard, agreement
Ct 1 amended to Co Ord 9.05
Court arraigns Def on amended Ct 1
Def pleads No contest
Court imposes fine of $200 plus costs = $456.50, to be pd w/i 30 days or CJ & SDC
Court dismisses Ct 2
9:45 AM

2:30 PM Prosecuting attorney Mitchell John Philbin in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Richard L. Amundson in court.  Attorney Michael Gerald Perry . in court for Richard L. Amundson. 
Court calls case. 
Atty spks- case was resolved with ADA Mraz.
ADA Mraz is no longer on the case. 
ADA spks- there is no change on the agreement. 
Court schedules with parties. 
2:32 PM
Status conference scheduled for September 6, 2022 at 09:30 am.

Court calls case. 
Atty spks- case has not been resolved.
Requests STC. 
ADA spks- offer has been made. 
Court schedules with parties. 
8:33 AM
Status conference scheduled for August 4, 2022 at 02:30 pm.
